experiences.title: Software Engineer ||
points: Designed and implemented a NodeJS application that can handle running experiments in any app as well as log the related information.
Designed and implemented a data model for an experiments application that supports experiments, feature toggling, logging, and custom user filtering for the experiments.
Mentored 3 engineers on their career goals and how to work on achieving them.
Brought in Azure Functions as a technology and developed an enterprise wide deployment, monitoring, and development strategy for them.

experiences.title: Technical Lead
points: Designed and implemented digital experiments to get an understanding of what our users would like to see.
Stood up GraphQL API using AWS AppSync to consolidate API calls as well as obscure sensitive data.
Worked with business partners to design digital experiments that spanned across multiple large applications.
Mentored and trained developers on best practices, cloud technologies, coding languages, and architectural design.

experiences.title: Sr. Software Engineer
points: Designed and implemented document storage for an Angular site in AWS S3.
Led charge on changing to be a Dev-Ops team by designing fully automated CI/CD pipelines with added monitoring and reporting.
Designed and implemented APIs that get over 100,000 calls per hour.
Did live demonstrations for multiple teams on how to design and build CI/CD pipelines.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
points: Worked with Java to write back-end services to handle business logic and database connections.
Worked in an agile/Scrum team framework Used Angular 8 for web development.
Stood up multiple applications of all diï¬€erent types in Kubernetes Containerized applications using Docker.
Stood up CI/CD pipelines utilizing Concourse and Jenkins Stood up Ruby automated test suite for APIs.

about.introduction:
I'm a skilled software developer with experience in TypeScript and
JavaScript, and expertise in frameworks like React, Node.js, and Angular
I'm a quick learner and collaborate closely with teammates and business partners to
create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve
real-world problems.

projects.introduction:
The following are some projects that I have taken on outside of work
to solve a problem I was seeing in my personal life or learn a new skill.

cards.title: Turtle recognition
cards.body:
Worked with the Toledo Zoo on an app that used opencv and python to do image recognition to identify turtles. This was an attempt at keeping track of turtle movement.

#python #swift #opencv

cards.title: Discord Bot
cards.body:
Wrote a Discord bot that would remove messages from other bots and the commands to trigger them, so that the discord chats would not get cluttered with bot messages

#discord #nodejs

cards.title: Exploding Kittens
cards.body:
Exploding Kittens is a card game, I have a project that is currently in progress to make a web version of the card game utilizing web-sockts for multiplayer

#react #nodejs #exploding-kittens

hero.body: I am a Software Engineer who loves learning new technologies and innovating with creative solutions.
